compliant.section: 本公司設有網站防火牆、入侵偵測/防禦系統、防毒系統等相關的各項資訊安全設備及必要的安全防護措施，加以保護網站及使用者個人資料採用嚴格的保護措施，只由經過授權的人員才能接觸使用者個人資料，相關處理人員皆簽有保密合約，如有違反保密義務者，將會受到相關的法律處分。
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with Article 32, outlining the implementation of appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, including pseudonymization and encryption of personal data, ensuring confidentiality, integrity, availability and resilience of processing systems and services.

compliant.section: 本公司於使用者所申請使用的系統服務或業務範圍內進行個人資料的蒐集、處理及利用。
compliant.legal provisions: This section partially aligns with GDPR principles of lawfulness, fairness, and transparency (Article 5) and purpose limitation (Article 6). It establishes a legal basis for processing data within the scope of services but needs further clarification on specific lawful bases for different processing activities.

compliant.section: 個人資料當事人得依據本公司公告的「個人資料當事人行使權利辦法」請求查詢、閱覽、取得複製本 、補充或更正個人資料內容，或請求停止蒐集、處理、利用或刪除個人資料內容部分。
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with data subject rights outlined in Articles 15 (right of access), 16 (right to rectification), 17 (right to erasure), 18 (right to restriction of processing), and 21 (right to object). It allows individuals to exercise their rights regarding their personal data.

non_compliant.section: 但因系統或服務下線而進行資料庫刪除或配合法令規定必需縮短利用期間時，本公司將依該作業或規定辦理，不另通知。
non_compliant.legal provisions: This section does not comply with Articles 13 and 14, which mandate transparent communication of data processing information to data subjects. Deleting data without informing individuals or shortening retention periods without notice violates these provisions.
non_compliant.amend: Amend this section to ensure transparency and provide clear notice to individuals regarding data retention periods and any instances of data deletion due to system changes or legal requirements.

non_compliant.section: 本公司利用個人資料的地區以使用者所申辦的系統服務所及地區範圍為準。如有國際傳輸需要，本公司將適法辦理；如目的事業主管機關另有規定者，本公司將遵守其規定。
non_compliant.legal provisions: This section partially addresses international data transfers but lacks specificity regarding compliance with Chapter V of the GDPR (Articles 44-50). It needs to elaborate on the safeguards employed for international transfers, such as adequacy decisions, appropriate safeguards, or derogations.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the mechanisms used to ensure GDPR compliance for international data transfers, including adequacy decisions, Standard Contractual Clauses, Binding Corporate Rules, or other appropriate safeguards. Clearly state the legal basis for such transfers and provide information about data subject rights in case of international transfers.

non_compliant.section: 若因業務需求有必要委託第三者提供服務時，本公司會嚴格要求第三者遵守個人資料保護法來保護個人資料。除非經過個人資料當事人同意、授權或依據法令規定，本公司不會任意出售或交換個人資料給其他團體或個人。如政府單位依合法正式的程序指示或申請，本公司將配合提供特定個人資料。
non_compliant.legal provisions: This section partially addresses data processing agreements with third parties (Article 28) and data sharing with authorities (Article 29) but lacks detail. It needs to specify the requirements for data processing agreements and the legal basis for disclosing data to authorities.
non_compliant.amend: Provide more details about the content of data processing agreements with third parties, ensuring they comply with Article 28. Specify the legal basis for disclosing personal data to government authorities and outline the procedures followed to verify the legality of such requests.
